ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ooh, I like the idea about the armor mold shapes and such. I like how in Morrowind there are user created mods to make armor look different if you want. It
ygData.messageBody:
Ooh, I like the idea about the armor mold shapes and such. I like how in
Morrowind there are user created mods to make armor look different if you
want. It would be cool if users could submit new designs for armor and
clothes to the game creators
so they could decide whether or not to add it. Only thing is, it would
require more system resources to label what design is available for what
piece of armor.
I saw a rainbow colored robe/dress in a catalog and thought it would be
hilarious to see that on a player in game.
luv,
-Su
>
> A game feature I'd like to see is customer service *grin* but since EQ is
> all about making the game fair and equal as possible (nerfing items and so
> on) I'd like to see some equality in the races..I mean the evil races get
> the 2 biggest and baddest races in the game while the good races get the
> smartest..why not make them all equal? Another thing I'd think would be
> cool is a feature that relates to the armor dyes..molding, and tailoring
any
> piece of gear you own to your own liking. Like say if you were a ogre
> warrior and you didn't like the way your helmet looked like, well you
could
> go down to a forge or blacksmith and pay a certain amount to have them
mold
> the helmet anyway you would like..maybe you would like horns on the helmet
> or a certain design ecthed on it..and for casters you could go to a tailor
> somewhere and have them design your robe a certain way..maybe you would
like
> longer sleeves or a slit in your robe or a fancy collar.
>
> Dabruiser Troll
> Warrior of the 29th season
>
